text:
@realDonaldTrump S. Korean Prez Moon Jai-in locked down/isolated/TESTED/contained COVID19.
New Zealand PM Ardern locked down/isolated/TESTED/ contained the virus.
NOT EVEN 250 of their people died. 39,291 Americans are dead.
You golfed/held rallies/fundraised/lied/denied/blamed.
Unforgivable. https://t.co/B7cCscPOa6
